title: 2010 Grant Balance Oxford
abstractText: Oxford will use the 2010 Grant Balance funding to help manage the transition period between the cessation of project studentship support (2011) and the next call for CDT funding. Postgraduate research (PGR) students are a strategic priority for Oxford, and an integral part of research in the mathematical, physical and life sciences. Targeted support will be given to departments with the highest concentrations of project students, in order to help sustain the vitality of the PGR community in these areas.
